ELEMENT.CREATOR: STAFF
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: Search Box 1 Search Hints Welcome Message
ELEMENT.TITLE: This is a search results layout designed for the advanced search functionality in the Evolution layout.

ELEMENT.HTML:
>
"><% load($zoovy:prod_thumb); default(""); default($zoovy:prod_image1); image(w=>"50",h=>"50",tag=>"1"); print(); %>
" CLASS="search_list_text" STYLE="font-weight:bold; font-size:11px;"><% load($zoovy:prod_name); default(""); strip(length=>"35",breaks=>"1",html=>"1"); print(); %>
" CLASS="search_list_text"><% load($zoovy:prod_desc); default(""); format(wiki,title1=>"",/title1=>"",title2=>"",/title2=>"",title3=>"",/title3=>"",listitem=>"",/listitem=>"",list=>"",/list=>"",hardbreak=>""); strip(length=>"150"); print(); %>
<% load($zoovy:base_price); default(""); format(money); format(after=>"space",skipblank=>"1"); format(after=>"bar",skipblank=>"1"); print(); %> <% load($ADD_LINK); default(""); print(); %>
